```{r}

#install.packages("mdsr")
#install.packages("RMySQL")

library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
whole_db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname= "imdb")

```

```{r}
getmovies <-"
SELECT *
FROM movie_info 
	JOIN title 
	ON movie_id
WHERE info_type_id
IN (90, 91, 92) AND 
kind_id= 1;"
```

```{r}
whole_db %>%
dbGetQuery(getmovies)
```
